QuestData.Title: Warchief's Command: Northern Barrens!
QuestData.Description: All able-bodied members of the Horde are hereby ordered to report to Kargal Battlescar at Far Watch Post in the Northern Barrens.$B$BYour help is needed to secure the Northern Barrens against the encroaching quilboars and centaurs.$B$BTo reach Far Watch Post, travel west across Durotar's Southfury Watershed and cross the bridge into the Northern Barrens.$B$BDestiny calls!
QuestData.LogDescription: Report to Kargal Battlescar at Far Watch Post in the Northern Barrens.
QuestData.RewardText: You look competent with a weapon or a spellbook. We could use your help in driving back the quilboars in these parts.
